Pencil Sharpener with Built-In Eraser: A device that combines a pencil sharpener with an eraser, allowing users to easily sharpen and erase their pencil at the same time. This would be a convenient solution for students or anyone who needs to take notes frequently.
Portable Pencil Sharpener: A compact and portable pencil sharpener that can be easily carried around. This would be useful for people who are always on the go and need to keep their pencils sharp.
Digital Pencil Sharpener: A device that uses a digital mechanism to sharpen pencils. This would be a more precise and efficient solution, eliminating the need for manual labor.

Pencil Sharpener with Multiple Sharpness Settings: A device that allows users to adjust the sharpness of their pencil to their preference. This would be useful for people who like their pencils to be a certain thickness or who prefer a different level of sharpness for different tasks.

Pencil Sharpener with Built-In Storage: A device that includes a storage compartment for pencils. This would be useful for people who have a lot of pencils and need a convenient way to store them when not in use.
